com.thedemgel.regions.annotations

Annotation Type OnTick


  • @Target(value=METHOD)
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface OnTick
    OnTick is a Annotation that needs to be placed on any method in a Feature that needs to fire every tick, multiple methods within a feature can have OnTick placed on them. The OnTick annotation takes one optional argument of "load" to indicate how much work this OnTick method does, and whether or not to process this method.

    @OnTick(load = Intensity.LOW, freq = 1)

    The default is Ignore which means this will happen every tick and doesn't check the TPS of the server. To use the default you don't need to set the argument

    @OnTick public void someMethod(float dt, Region region)

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      int freq 
      Intensity load 

    • Element Detail

      • load

        public abstract Intensity load
        Default:
        com.thedemgel.regions.annotations.Intensity.IGNORE

      • freq

        public abstract int freq
        Default:
        1
